game

Class Waka

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.GameObject
      • game.Waka
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Character

    public class Waka
extends GameObject
implements Character
    Waka class which manages all aspects of Waka's functionality.

      • conductReverseDirection

        public void conductReverseDirection(Game game)
        Allows Waka to instantly turn in the opposite direction if the opposite keyboard keypress is made.
        Parameters:
        game - The Game object

      • conductQueuedMovement

        public void conductQueuedMovement(Game game)
        A method for queued movement, allowing Waka to turn in the direction of a keypress only if Waka is in the centre of the current cell and there is no wall blocking the path.
        This allows Waka to turn at the next possible opportunity.
        Parameters:
        game - The Game object

      • checkWallCollision

        public void checkWallCollision(Game game)
        Halt Waka's movement if he runs into a wall in the direction of movement.
        Parameters:
        game - The Game object

      • checkFruitCollision

        public void checkFruitCollision(App app,
                                Game game)
        Detect if Waka is colliding with a consumable object. If so, activate their individual collide methods.
        Parameters:
        app - The App object
        game - The Game object

      • checkGhostCollision

        public void checkGhostCollision(Game game)
        Check whether Waka is colliding with a ghost and call ghost's collide method if collision has occured.
        Parameters:
        game - The Game object
